## Remarks This enumeration currently contains only the F:System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation.ApplicationBase?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True value.
The methods in the T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True class that use this enumeration enable partially trusted hosts, which may not have permission to discover their own location, to find and activate add-ins in their own directory.
You can use the M:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update(System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation)?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False and M:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild(System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation)?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False method overloads to specify a location for updating or rebuilding the pipeline store, and the M:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.FindAddIns(System.Type,System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation,System.String[])?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False method overload to specify a location for finding add-ins.
